sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.c_parentid , A.c_position , A.c_left , A.c_right , A.c_level , A.c_title , A.c_type /* user filed add point*/
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE C_TITLE TotalArticle '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_BOARD_ID = #boardID# , C_ARTICLE_ID = #articleID# , C_REG_ID = #regID# , C_IS_DELETED_FL = #isDeletedFL# , C_REG_DT = #regDT# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_ARTICLE_ID as articleID , C_REG_ID as regID , C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFL , C_REG_DT as regDT FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)

/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL ) VALUES ( S_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level# )
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL

sqlMap.select:
/* getTotalArticlesByBoardID */
, A.C_TITLE as c_title , A.C_BOARD_ID as boardID , A.C_ARTICLE_ID as articleID , A.C_REG_ID as regID , A.C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFL , A.C_REG_DT as regDT FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_BOARD_ID = #boardID# ORDER BY A.C_ID DESC

/* getArticlesByRegIDAndPage */
, A.C_TITLE as c_title , A.C_BOARD_ID as boardID , A.C_ARTICLE_ID as articleID , A.C_REG_ID as regID , A.C_IS_DELETED_FL as isDeletedFL , A.C_REG_DT as regDT /* 페이징 처리 */ FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, Z.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.C_REG_ID = #regID# ORDER BY C_ID DESC ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= (#pageNum# * #pageSize#) ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RNUM >= (1 + ((#pageNum# - 1) * #pageSize#))
sqlMap.update: /* updateTitleByBoardIdAndRegID */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_TITLE = #c_title# WHERE 1=1 AND C_BOARD_ID = #boardID# AND C_ARTICLE_ID = #articleID#
/* updateIsDeletedFLByBoardIdAndRegID */ UPDATE T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE SET C_IS_DELETED_FL = #isDeletedFL# WHERE 1=1 AND C_BOARD_ID = #boardID# AND C_ARTICLE_ID = #articleID#
sqlMap.select: /* getTotalArticleCountByRegID */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_BOARD_TOTAL_ARTICLE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_REG_ID = #regID#
